title: Online International Relations Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic international relations terminology and organizational work experience
context.additional_context: Course for current practitioners to improve practical skills such as international negotiation and intercultural communication. Digital devices are provided, with a focus on asynchronous learning activities.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze conflict cases occurring in actual corporate environments using basic international relations theories
Learners can develop and implement effective communication strategies through international negotiation simulation tasks
Learners can apply practical document writing standards considering diverse cultural backgrounds with over 80% accuracy
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
